      Cancel a posted order given a order sequence number

      Create a new wallet

      Static method to get the balance collection of a given address

      Get order book

      Get order by hash number
      OrderCollection Wallet.getOrders()
      Get all orders of a wallet
      Payment Wallet.getPaymentByID(java.lang.String id)
      Take hash number or resource ID to get payment information
      PaymentCollection Wallet.getPayments() 
      Transaction Wallet.getTransactionByHash(java.lang.String hash)
      Get transaction by hash number

      Get transaction info
      TrustLineCollection Wallet.getTrustLine()
      Get all trust lines

      Post payment
